price: يۇسۇفنىڭ كۆڭلىكى ئارقىسىدىن يىرتىلغان بولسا، ئۇ(يەنى زۈلەيخانىڭ) سۆزى يالغان، يۇسۇفنىڭ سۆزى راست» دېدى[27].
arabic: وَإِن كَانَ قَمِيصُهُۥ قُدَّ مِن دُبُرٖ فَكَذَبَتۡ وَهُوَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Uyghur translation - Sh. Muhammad Saleh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uyghur by Sh. Muhammad Saleh. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-in kāna qamīṣuhu qudda min duburin fakadhabat wahuwa mina al-ṣādiqīna
